word: If your router has a WPS button and the Intercom hasn't been connected through
Ethernet (either for hardwired or Wi-Fi setups) , follow the steps below for
connection. If WPS connection fails or your router lacks a WPS button, revisit the
'Connect Network' section in this guide to set up Ethernet:
Note: A site visit is necessary if Wi-Fi is the sole intended method for internet
Ensure the Intercom has been successfully connected
Push the WPS button on the router and press down on the
WPS lever on the Intercom at the same time.
Wait 5 minutes for the WPS Wi-Fi connection to be established
Testing and verification will happen during activation.
WPS Wi-Fi connection will be verified and tested later in
the installation, after contacting ButterflyMX Support to
